predictions.text: The U.S. Department of Defense will publicly announce at least one airstrike targeting ISIS in Syria or Iraq by 2026-01-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: A DoD/CENTCOM press release or website post explicitly stating U.S. forces conducted airstrikes against ISIS targets in Syria or Iraq within the window.
evidence: Recent ISIS attack on Americans increased likelihood of U.S. retaliation
Historical U.S. response patterns to ISIS attacks (CENTCOM press releases)
monitoring_signals: CENTCOM press statements and social media
Increased ISR flight activity reports over Syria/Iraq
Major media citing named DoD officials on imminent reprisals
predictions.rationale: High-profile ISIS attack raises probability of targeted U.S. retaliatory strikes.

predictions.text: OFAC will announce at least one Iran-related sanctions designation via a U.S. Treasury press release by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: A U.S. Treasury press release on treasury.gov explicitly identifying new Iran-related designations or additions to the SDN List within the period.
evidence: Heightened regional tensions following attacks and proxy activity
Regular cadence of Iran-related designations by OFAC in recent years
monitoring_signals: Congressional or NSC statements hinting at sanctions
Iranian proxy activity in Iraq/Syria/Red Sea
predictions.rationale: Escalation risk and standard U.S. sanctions toolkit make a near-term action plausible.

predictions.text: MBA Weekly Applications Survey will report the adjustable-rate mortgage (ARM) share at or above 10.0% in at least one weekly release by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: An official MBA Weekly Applications Survey press release or data table showing ARM share of total applications >= 10.0% for any reported week within the window.
evidence: Affordability pressures pushing buyers toward ARMs and buydowns
Recent trend of increased ARM uptake in high-rate environments
predictions.rationale: Rate spreads and affordability constraints should intermittently lift ARM share above 10%.

predictions.text: Cboe VIX3M minus VIX (term structure spread) will close at or below -2.0 points on at least one trading day by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Cboe or reputable market data showing daily closing values with VIX3M - VIX <= -2.0 on any trading day in the period.
evidence: Late-cycle risks and policy uncertainty can invert near-term vol
Episodes of front-month stress compress the term structure
monitoring_signals: Macro event risk calendar (FOMC, CPI, geopolitics)
predictions.rationale: Periodic risk spikes often invert the vol curve into negative territory.

predictions.text: EIA Weekly Natural Gas Storage Report will show a Lower 48 net withdrawal of at least 180 Bcf in at least one report published by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Any EIA Weekly Natural Gas Storage Report within the window listing a net withdrawal >= 180 Bcf for the Lower 48.
evidence: Winter cold snaps can drive large weekly draws
Storage levels and production/exports interplay
monitoring_signals: NOAA HDD forecasts and Polar vortex risk
Appalachia and Permian gas production trends
predictions.rationale: Requires a significant cold event; plausible but not baseline.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS10) will close at or above 4.50% on at least one trading day by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: FRED DGS10 or Treasury data showing a daily close >= 4.50% within the specified period.
evidence: Policy uncertainty around new Fed leadership and cuts timing
Term premium sensitivity to fiscal supply and inflation surprises
monitoring_signals: Treasury refunding announcements and auction tails
Fed communications and balance sheet policy
Global yields (Bunds, JGBs) and FX moves
predictions.rationale: Upside tail from inflation or supply shocks could lift long-end yields.

predictions.text: The European Commission will open at least one new formal non-compliance proceeding under the Digital Markets Act against a designated gatekeeper by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Official European Commission communication announcing a DMA non-compliance proceeding against a gatekeeper during the period.
evidence: Ongoing DMA scrutiny and prior investigations
Regulator momentum to enforce interoperability/anti-steering rules
monitoring_signals: EC press releases and case register
Gatekeeper compliance updates and app store policy changes
predictions.rationale: Extended horizon raises likelihood amid active DMA enforcement pipeline.

predictions.text: At least one of the top five U.S. commercial insurers (UnitedHealthcare, Elevance/Anthem, Aetna/CVS, Cigna, Humana) will announce expanded GLP-1 coverage for obesity including maintenance beyond 12 months by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Public insurer policy bulletin or press release clearly expanding GLP-1 obesity coverage to include maintenance beyond 12 months within the window.
evidence: Emerging data on broader GLP-1 benefits (e.g., cardiometabolic, cognitive)
Competitive pressure and employer demand for obesity coverage
monitoring_signals: Insurer formulary updates and prior auth criteria
Outcomes data and guidelines from medical societies
Pharma payer negotiations and rebate structures
predictions.rationale: Clinical momentum and market competition may push incremental coverage expansion.

predictions.text: U.S. CPI (headline, MoM, seasonally adjusted) for January 2026 will print between -0.1% and +0.3%.
predictions.verification_criteria: BLS CPI news release for January 2026 showing headline MoM SA within [-0.1%, +0.3%].
evidence: Recent disinflation trend with volatile energy components
Shelter deceleration offsetting services stickiness
monitoring_signals: High-frequency gasoline prices and utility rates
Goods price trackers and freight rates
predictions.rationale: Base effects and easing goods prices likely keep monthly CPI in a low range.

predictions.text: NOAA SWPC will report at least one R3 (Strong) Radio Blackout event by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: SWPC event logs or alerts indicating an R3 radio blackout classification (X-ray flux) occurring within the period.
evidence: Solar cycle peak window increases severe space weather probability
Recent uptick in geomagnetic and radiation storms
monitoring_signals: Solar active region counts and AR complexity
predictions.rationale: Solar maximum conditions raise odds of strong radio blackout events.

predictions.text: EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report will show U.S. crude oil field production at or above 13.6 million barrels/day in at least one release by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Any EIA WPSR within the window listing crude oil field production >= 13.6 million bpd.
evidence: Recent record U.S. production and productivity gains
Permian associated gas/oil growth and improved drilling efficiency
monitoring_signals: Rig counts and frac spread data
predictions.rationale: Momentum in shale efficiency and completions supports incremental production highs.

predictions.text: Berkshire Hathaway Class B (BRK.B) will close at a new all-time high on at least one trading day by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Exchange data (NYSE/Nasdaq) or reputable financial data sources showing a BRK.B daily closing price exceeding its prior all-time closing high within the period.
evidence: Potential governance and capital allocation shifts post-management changes
Strong insurance underwriting and investment income tailwinds from higher rates
predictions.rationale: Buybacks and earnings power provide a path to marginal new highs.
